name: Duel! (Prototype)
description:
DUEL!

Duel is a 2-player party brawler game inspired by Nidhogg, Duck Game, and Adventure (Atari 2600). Two players take control of colored circles, point their 'swords', and duke it out.

Currently a prototype. XBox controllers required. Local multiplayer only.

CONTROLS:

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Aim

Right Trigger - Shoot

Esc - Quit
